title: The Noble Daughter Will Steal The Panties Of “That Girl” Using The Strongest Magic - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo Ai
tags: All-Girls School   Child Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Magic   Witches
author: レト
description:
Freya Delilah Eustace-Diana is a student of St. Heidi Twirl’s School for Witches. Reigning at the top of the school hierarchy, she wishes to become friends with Kaede Miharu, a transfer student from the Far East. So she decided to steal her panties as the first step in her plan. Don’t misunderstand her!

Freya lives in a school dormitory away from her busy parents. It’s difficult for her to interact with others because she’s afraid of dragging her family’s name in the mud. The painstakingly crafted plan she had to get close to Kaede Miharu, a transfer student from the Far East in a situation similar to hers, is to steal her panties then return them to her!>
